protocol.name: P-GSE22836-2
protocol.text: 46 days-old transgenic Arabidopsis rosette were sprayed with 30µM DEX for 5 hours and then whole rosettes were carefully harvested. As control, 46 days-old transgenic Arabidopsis rosette were sprayed with 0.05% ethanol (mock) for 5 hours.

protocol.name: P-GSE22836-3
protocol.text: Transgenic plants were grown in soil and germinated under controlled condition in a growth chamber with a 16-h day lenght provided by fluorescent light at 80 or 120 µmol m2- s1- and a days/night temperature of 20/16 C°  and relative humidity 60/75%.

protocol.name: P-GSE22836-4
protocol.text: RNA extraction performed using Rneasy Plant MiniKit (Qiagene)

protocol.name: P-GSE22836-5
protocol.text: Labling procedure performed using MessageAmpTM II-Biotin Enhanced Kit

protocol.name: P-GSE22836-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with GCRMA (Wu et al., 2004).
